name: Legends Runner
description:
ONLINE HIGHSCORES ONLY AVAILABLE ON DOWNLOADED VERSION

Legends Runner is an infinite runner with two modes that alternate between each other. In the 'normal' mode, you must avoid all the obstacles. If you hit something the game is over. When the game switches to 'sacrifice' mode, you try to hit the obstacles, and gain extra points for doing so.

Legends Runner was made for Ludum Dare 43.

Patrick Gauthier

  • Audio Design
  • Game Design

Tyler Jones

  • Programming
  • Art
  • Game Design

We used Unity to make our game, and everything is from scratch.
